page.title: 12Family Life cont.
page.content: {5.30p.m.}Return home avoiding main roads again - the majority of my journey is on country roads. {6.00p.m.}Arrive home where my wife has a cooked meal ready which we share with the children. {Evening.}Variety of jobs - gardening, decorating, general DIY; or visiting relations; or playing with the children; listening to records, reading or watching television. {11.00p.m.-12.30a.m.}Anytime between these times is usually bedtime. {Weekends and Holidays.} Obviously the normal routine alters in that we don't get up so early and the day is spent visiting interesting buildings/parks/ museums or shopping or DIY in the house or caravan. In the summer we tend to use the caravan fairly regularly for weekends away, especially bank holiday weekends.
